description: [Status: stable] [Name: invalid-todo-capitalization] [Message: Invalid TODO capitalization: {tag} should be TODO] What it does Checks that a "TODO" tag is properly capitalized (i.e., that the tag is uppercase). Why is this bad? Capitalizing the "TODO" in a TODO comment is a convention that makes it easier for future readers to identify TODOs. Example # todo(charlie): capitalize this Use instead: # TODO(charlie): this is capitalized
